Description_lang: Cover yourself with $u Hellsteel Plates, reducing damage taken by $400962s1 and your movement speed by $400962s2% per plate, for $400986d2. Taking $400962s5 damage ruptures one plate, removing it and releasing forth a pillar of Shadowflame that deals $400962s4 damage to all enemies in its path. This effect may only occur once every $400962s6 sec. Upon expiration, all remaining plates rupture.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage taken reduced by $w1. Movement speed decreased by $w2%.
